sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Calendar, MapPin, Star, Users, Wifi, Car, Coffee, Waves } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const CebuResortBooking = () => { const [checkIn, setCheckIn] = useState(''); const [checkOut, setCheckOut] = useState(''); const [guests, setGuests] = useState(2); const [selectedRoom, setSelectedRoom] = useState(null); const [currentImageIndex, setCurrentImageIndex] = useState(0); // 메인 히어로 이미지들 const heroImages = [ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520250497591-112f2f40a3f4?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2000&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571896349842-33c89424de2d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2000&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1582719478250-c89cae4dc85b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2000&q=80' ]; // 객실 데이터 const rooms = [ { id: 1, name: 'Ocean View Deluxe Suite', price: 245000, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1578683010236-d716f9a3f461?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: '바다가 내려다보이는 럭셔리 스위트룸', size: '55㎡', capacity: 3, amenities: ['무료 Wi-Fi', '미니바', '발코니', '바다 전망'] }, { id: 2, name: 'Premium Villa with Pool', price: 380000, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1502672260266-1c1ef2d93688?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: '프라이빗 풀이 있는 럭셔리 빌라', size: '85㎡', capacity: 4, amenities: ['프라이빗 풀', '바다 전망', '키친', '테라스'] }, { id: 3, name: 'Beachfront Paradise Suite', price: 195000, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: '해변 바로 앞 프리미엄 스위트', size: '45㎡', capacity: 2, amenities: ['해변 접근', '스파 욕조', '미니바', '룸서비스'] } ]; // 리조트 시설들 const facilities = [ { icon: , name: '인피니티 풀', desc: '바다와 하나되는 풀' }, { icon: , name: '루프탑 레스토랑', desc: '세부 최고의 요리' }, { icon: , name: '공항 픽업', desc: '무료 픽업 서비스' }, { icon: , name: '프리미엄 스파', desc: '전통 필리핀 마사지' } ];
